description: Organize, protect and carry all your valuable digital storage devices with the convenient Deluxe Media Case 30 from Lowepro. Expressly designed for a portable hard drive, it includes dedicated storage space for up to 4 memory cards and 1 CF card, up to 2 USB flash drives and a cable. Durable, molded EVA foam construction provides maximum protection on the exterior. Soft, brushed tricot lining safeguards contents from dust and scratches on the interior. Additional features include dual, wrap-around zippers and a sturdy D-ring attachment. Available in Black.
title: Lowepro Deluxe Media Case 30 for Portable Hard Drives
